name: Czarny Orzel
overview: Czarny Orzeł is a crosshair shooter. A super secret helicopter named Black Eagle was stolen by the Cuban revolutionaries. The player's task is a diversion in the enemy base preceding the main attack of U.S. commando forces. The player may use two weapons: rifle or heavy grenades. The game takes place on a single level with tasks such as: blowing up the entrance gate, the destruction of stocks of fuel and ammunition, finding the command center of the revolutionaries, taking over the Black Eagle helicopter.
